rune.author: billythegoat101
rune.sacrifices: Sacrifice: -2xLog at Plant & Gunpowder levels -2xCoal at Lapis & Blaze levels. Notes: -Requires hole in the center.
rune.description: Description: Digs a pit down into the earth. Requires a hole at the center of the rune (1 block down). ---- Allowed Variable Dusts: Plant Gunpowder Lapis Blaze
